message:

story: Anas Rabei shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Consumed messages from Kafak is printed as numbers in spring-xd
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: I am trying to make a simple spring-xd experiment. Spring-xd is downloaded and running in the single node mode. We already have a Kafka cluster and we have a spark streaming job that read tweets ...
